text: Aurora Chancayllo is a Peruvian football club, playing in the city of Chancay, Huaral, Lima, Peru. ==History== The club was founded in August 10, 1931. In the 1968 Copa Perú, the club classified to the Final Stage, with the Sport Chorrillos of Talara, Carlos A. Mannucci of Trujillo, Cienciano of the Cusco, FBC Melgar of Arequipa and Colegio Nacional de Iquitos. In the final stage, the club finalized in last place.Peru - Copa Perú 1968 In the 1999 Copa Perú, the club classified to the Regional Stage, but was eliminated by Estudiantes de Medicina of Ica and Somos Aduanas of the Callao.Peru - Copa Perú 1999 In the 2000 Copa Perú, the club classified to the Regional Stage, but was eliminated by Estudiantes de Medicina.Peru - Copa Perú 2000 In the 2001 Segunda División Peruana, the club was relegated to the Copa Perú.Peru 2001 In the 2014 Copa Perú, the club classified to the National Stage, but was eliminated by Sport Loreto in quarterfinals.Peru - Copa Perú 2000 ==Honours== ===Regional=== *Región IV: ::Winners (1): 2014 ::Runner-up (1): 1999 *Liga Departamental de Lima: ::Winners (4): 1967, 1999, 2000, 2014 *Liga Provincial de Huaral: ::Winners (3): 1997, 1999, 2014 *Liga Distrital de Chancay: ::Winners (6): 1996, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2014 ==See also== *List of football clubs in Peru *Peruvian football league system == References == Category:Football clubs in Peru Category:Association football clubs established in 1931 Category:1931 establishments in Peru
title: Aurora Chancayllo
